alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 8:14PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Big Horn and northeastern Park Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 814 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Ralston, which is also 12 miles south of Powell, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Powell, Garland and Byron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin
